Masih Riskan, Juventus Berencana Simpan Pjanic dari Derby della Mole
01 Nov 2019, 08:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus akan melakoni laga penting di ajang Serie A akhir pekan ini. Skuat asuhan Maurizio Sarri itu akan bertarung dengan salah satu rival terberatnya, Torino.
Situasi kedua klub itu dalam beberapa tahun terakhir bisa dikatakan jomplang. Juventus terus-menerus meraih Scudetto, sementara Torino masih puas sebagai penghuni tetap papan tengah klasemen Serie A.
Klub berjuluk Bianconeri itu juga tak pernah menelan kekalahan atas Torino daam lima pertemuan terakhirnya. Tetapi, bukan berarti mereka bisa diremehkan. Dari lima laga, hanya sekali Juventus menang dengan mencetak lebih dari satu gol.
Menjelang pertandingan penting itu, Juventus malah terancam tak bisa diperkuat oleh salah satu pemain andalannya, Miralem Pjanic. Gelandang asal Bosnia itu sendiri sudah absen di laga sebelum ini karena mengalami cedera.

text:
Still Risky, Juventus Plans to Save Pjanic from Derby della Mole
Nov 01 2019, 08:33 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus will play an important match in Serie A this weekend. Maurizio Sarri's squad will fight with one of its toughest rivals, Torino.
The situation of the two clubs in recent years can be said to be jagged. Juventus continue to win the Scudetto, while Torino is still content as a permanent resident of the middle board of Serie A.
The club nicknamed the Bianconeri have also never lost to Torino in its last five meetings. However, that does not mean they can be underestimated. Of the five matches, only once Juventus won by scoring more than one goal.
Ahead of that important match, Juventus instead threatened could not be strengthened by one of its flagship players, Miralem Pjanic. The Bosnian midfielder himself has missed the previous match due to injury.
